thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ingenico Group Reaches Agreement To Acquire Paymark

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ingenico Group Reaches Agreement To Acquire Paymark
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - INGENICO GROUP SA:
* INGENICO GROUP REACHES AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE PAYMARK, A NEW ZEALAND LEADER IN PAYMENT PROCESSING
* INGENICO GROUP REACHES AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE PAYMARK * CLOSING IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR DURING THE SECOND QUARTER OF 2018. ‍​
* GLOBAL CONSIDERATION OF NZD 190 MILLION * TRANSACTION IS SUBJECT TO RELEVANT REGULATORY CONSENTS * PAYMARK WILL BE INTEGRATED WITHIN THE BANKS & ACQUIRERS BUSINESS UNIT Source text: bit.ly/2Da2h3W Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
